attributes.action: Stop the proposed compulsory ID Cards for all UK nationals as this is an infringement of our human rights and not an answer to terrorism on our soils
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/CardsID/
reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
